title: HS2 is 'out of control' and firm is 'unwieldy', Andrea Leadsom says
text:
High Speed 2 is "out of control" and the government-owned firm building it is "unwieldy" and appears determined to "frustrate" compensation claims by homeowners, Andrea Leadsom has warned.

In a formal submission to Boris Johnson's review of whether and how the rail line should go ahead, Mrs Leadsom, the MP for South Northamptonshire and Business Secretary, said she had needed to intervene "time and time again" on behalf of her constituents due to "insensitive" behaviour by HS2 Ltd.
